title: Values and Variables
description: In this chapter, you will learn about the data types that you can manipulate in a JavaScript program: numbers, strings, and other primitive types, as well as objects and arrays. You will see how to store values in variables, how to convert values from one type to another, and how to combine values with operators.

courses.title: Variables
courses.description: Learn to work with JavaScript variables

courses.title: Numbers
courses.description: Find out what is special about numbers in JavaScript

courses.title: String and Template Literals
courses.description: Learn about string and template literals in JavaScript

courses.title: Object Basics
courses.description: Learn to work with object literals

courses.title: Array Basics
courses.description: Learn to work with array literals

courses.title: Destructuring
courses.description: Understand the destructuring syntax for arrays and objects
